column4: I've been watching Heroes on the NBC website via their flashplayer.  Tonight I went to watch the latest episode and now none of the on-screen controls work.  Has anyone else experienced a similar change recently (on NBC's site or elsewhere)?
What puzzles me is that it worked just fine like last week.
I recommend getting the eps in torrent and downlaoding it , much easier
Sure.  But I was content watching it on the site when it worked.
Having no ability to pause, skip ahead, etc., sucks.
I only skip ahead when I watch lost, the eps tend to drag on
Well, in this case I couldn't pause, so I closed the window, thinking I'd be able to start up where I left off.
As it turns out I seem to only be able to watch it all the way through without stopping.
flash doesn't work like that unfortunately
Their site had in player controls that would let you...until this week.
downloading it will let you watch it at leasure and it's probably the same amout of data
Yes, I agree.  No argument that the torrent would be technically superior in every way.
donT' panick about that , it might e caused by a number of things, the way the coded this particualr ep, a small change in the flash they used,  whatever, might be ok next week
Yeah.  I'll have to check it out next week to see if it's a consistent thing I guess.
